snippet.title: Heat and Run - Gameplay Trailer (updated!)
snippet.description:
Wishlist it: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1225790/Heat_and_Run/
Join the community: https://discord.com/invite/HjMefbK

Heat and Run is a 2D multiplayer shooter, strategic and frantic! Take on players from around the world in 4vs4 battles: Select a hero with unique skills, master the creation of Blocks in intense battles and destroy the opponent Flame to win the game.
